detaileddescription.para: Service changed client characteristic configuration descriptor
Size of Gatt Security Levels value
Mode 1 Level 1: Connection has no security
Mode 1 Level 2: Connection is encrypted with unauthenticated key
Mode 1 Level 3: Connection is encrypted with authenticated key
Mode 1 Level 4: Connection is encrypted with LE Secure Connections
Mode 2 Level 1: Use of unauthenticated pairing with data signing
Mode 2 Level 1: Use of authenticated pairing with data signing
Mode 3 Level 1: No security broadcast (no authentication and no encryption)
Mode 3 Level 2: Use of unauthenticated Broadcast_Code
Mode 3 Level 3: Use of authenticated Broadcast_Code

briefdescription.para: Update the central address resolution attribute value.
Add the GATT Key Material to the attribute server.
Add the Resolvable Private Address Only (RPAO) characteristic to the GAP service. The RPAO characteristic should be added only when DM Privacy is enabled.
Set the Server Supported Features (SSF) bitmask.
